summary: A main menu image replacer, using a Daedric wallpaper that I have made.
descriptionHtml:
[color=green] [b] Hey guys, Here is my \'Daedric wallpaper\' that I have created, [/b] [/color]

I have set it so it changes the main menu background from that [b] \"Skyrim Mesh\" [/b] to my wallpaper. It took me quite a while to make this image, I took a lot of effort so I hope you enjoy.

[img] http://i.imgur.com/EeyRzQ2.png [/img]

This is a small mod just to make the main menu more \"attractive\"

[color=yellow] [b] I have also included seperate files which you can just use as a wallpaper if you like. [/b]
[/color]

[color=#00FFFF] [i] they come in these sizes [/i] [/color]

[color=#00FF00] [list]
[*] 1920x1080
[*] 1280x720
[*] 1440x900
[*] 1366x768
[/list] [/color]

[Heading] [b] Recommended Similar Mods [/Heading] [/b]

[list]
[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7901#content] No Menu and Loading Smoke by IceKK [/url]
[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8023#content] No Bethesda Logo In Menu by IceKK [/url]
[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21308] Skyrim Theme Menu Music --- Violin Cover by Jason Yang by Drcfan [/url]
[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18264] Skyrim Theme Menu Music - Peter Hollens_Lindsey Stirling by Drcfan [/url]
[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25796] Hoths Main Menu Music Replacer by HothTrooper44 [/url] [b] 

There is no preview on HothTrooper44\'s mod so go [url=https://soundcloud.com/welshboy99/hoths-main-menu-music-replacer] here [/url] to hear it [/b]
[/list]

[Heading] [b] [color=red] Thanks to [/b] [/color] [/heading]
[b] [i] [color=red] [list]
[*] mitchalek [/b] [/i] [/color] for providing the Horse textures and Meshes which he created for his amazing mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14950] Convenient Horses [/url]
[*] and [b] [i] [color=red] garryg [/b] [/i] [/color] for providing the new and improved Daedric mesh and textures that he made for his beautiful mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3104] Daedric Armor and weapon Improvement [/url]
[/list]

[color=red] [b] [i]  Endorse if you like this small mod [/b] [/i] [/color]
author: welshboy99

files.name: Skyrim - Daedric Wallpaper - Strip of writing
files.changelogHtml: *Fixed Black border at the top making the image seem 'un-aligned'

files.name: Skyrim Daedric Wallpaper
files.changelogHtml:
Changed "Main" file to "Optional" (By request) because the strip of acknowledgement decreased the physical appearance of the image.
Uploaded a new main file which completely removes the acknowledgement strip at the bottom.

files.name: Skyrim - Daedric Wallpaper - Main
files.changelogHtml: *Fixed Black border at the top making the image seem 'un-aligned'
